task_summary: Robot arm perceives, localizes, and approaches the scissors, planning a path to avoid obstacles present on the table surface.

task_long_description.overview: This task involves a tabletop manipulator in an office environment, which must visually locate a pair of scissors, plan a collision-free approach avoiding objects (e.g., mugs, books) obstructing the direct path, and navigate to a pre-grasp or approach pose above the scissors. Primary constraints are avoidance of all visible obstacles and precise final alignment with the scissors.
preconditions: Scene lighting is sufficient for vision
stepwise_plan: Check if scissors are visible, scan if needed
Move above scissors with vertical offset to pre-grasp pose
Approach and align while checking for obstacles
Move along Y axis to fine-tune approach/avoid obstacle
success_criteria: Robot is aligned with and at specified pose above the scissors
No collisions with obstacles happened during navigation
failure_and_recovery: Scissors not detected: re-scan area up to 3 times
Obstacle in path: adjust approach using MoveDelta
Vision misalignment: fallback to scanning or local realignment
task_long_description.termination: Task terminates when the robot is confirmed to be at the scissors location, above or beside it, with all obstacles avoided.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the scissors

node_specs.description: Checks if scissors are currently visible
Performs a grid scan to locate the scissors up to 3 attempts
Move to position above the scissors, avoiding obstacles
Aligns with the scissors with a tight tolerance
Fine approach maneuver along Y-axis for obstacle avoidance
Verifies robot is at scissors' location

failure_modes: Arm fails to achieve precise alignment
recovery_strategy: Adjust approach via MoveDelta or realign
Fallback to new visual scan if pose error detected
assumptions: Instruction does not specify if grasp is needed; frames show only reaching.
Scissors position remains fixed throughout; obstacle avoidance implied from table geometry.
Final grasp not depicted, so BT terminates at proximity/alignment.

expected_success_criteria: Robot reaches and aligns above scissors without collisions
